text: "Another Nail in My Heart" is a 1980 song by British band Squeeze and is the leading single from their third studio album Argybargy. It went to number 17 in the United Kingdom, number 56 in Canada and did not chart in the United States. ==Track list== 7" # "Another Nail in My Heart" # "Pretty Thing" ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:Squeeze (band) songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Progressive pop songs
title: Another Nail in My Heart
